alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Carson; Donley; Gray; Hutchinson; Roberts (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 6:32PM CDT until August 04 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR EASTERN ARMSTRONG...EASTERN CARSON...SOUTHEASTERN HUTCHINSON... GRAY...ROBERTS AND DONLEY COUNTIES... At 632 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 17 miles north of Skellytown to 5 miles southeast of Pampa to Clarendon, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Locations impacted include... Pampa, Clarendon, Miami, White Deer, Mclean, Groom, Lefors, Skellytown, Howardwick, Hedley, Lelia Lake, Lake Mcclellan, Goodnight, Lora, Kingsmill, Alanreed, Codman and Greenbelt Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Armstrong; Carson; Donley; Gray; Hutchinson; Roberts
